attributes.action: 12th July 2021 Should Be A Bank Holiday, If England Win Or Get To The Final
attributes.additional_details:
Should England Win Or Get To The Euro 2020 Final On Sunday, The Goverment Or Parliment Should Give Us A Bank Holiday On The Monday 12th July 2021.
After The Last 18 Months What We Have Been Through Together As A Country, The Government Or The Parliament Should Give Us A Day Off Ie A Bank Holiday To Celebrate The Possibility Of England Winning A First European Championship Our First Since 1966.
attributes.background: Should England Win Or Get To The Euro 2020 Final On Sunday, The Goverment Or Parliment Should Give Us A Bank Holiday On The Monday 12th July 2021

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
